title: The Rookie, Mr. Cooper
description: Awarded as the top-performing new hire in the PyroAI team for exceptional contributions in 2024-25.

title: Pressure, Queue, and Average Speed - Based Multi-Agent DQN for Optimizing Traffic Signal Control, IEEE Conference
description: This project utilized DQN and SUMO simulator. It demonstrated that optimizing for average speed and minimizing queue lengths are key to efficient traffic management.

title: Best Outstanding Student, MEPCO Schlenk Engg College
